Topic.Title: How to port Tau Station to your site

Posts.EditableText:
Hello,

We would love to bring Tau Station ( https://taustation.space/) to your site. However, Tau Station  is a narrative MMORPG. Thus, players need to be able to play the game on our server. We can upload assets, but we have no game to upload because the game requires that it be run on our server, with our database, and our backend code.
Could we do it using an Iframe or do you have any other solution for us? 
Thanks for your help.
Leila
